EmailTemplate.name: Case Resolved Notification for AT_EN Non-Members
EmailTemplate.subject: Case ID {!Case.Thread_Id} reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Two days ago we sent you an email about your enquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber}. We were looking forward to assisting further with your enquiry but have not heard back from you.
If your question has already answered there is no need to reply to this email and we will close your enquiry in 24 hours.
Best regards, Your DAZN Team
Case Thread ID: {!Case.Thread_Id} Privacy Policy: https://my.dazn.com/help/at-en/privacy Terms of Use: https://my.dazn.com/help/at-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
